definition[0]: to talk in an angry, uncontrolled, or crazy way
example[0]: He was still ranting and raving the next morning.
example[2]: Lisa raved on about how awful it all was.
definition[1]: a big event where people dance to loud music with a strong beat and often take drugs
definition[2]: strong praise for a new play, book etc
example[6]: The play got raves from the critics.
